description: Execute a PromQL query against Amazon Managed Prometheus at a specific instant in time

time.description: Optional timestamp for query evaluation (RFC3339 or Unix timestamp)

workspace_id.description: The Prometheus workspace ID to use (e.g., ws-12345678-abcd-1234-efgh-123456789012)

name: execute_query

description: Execute a range query and return the result over a time range

step.description: Query resolution step width (duration format, e.g. '15s', '1m', '1h')

workspace_id.description: The Prometheus workspace ID to use (e.g., ws-12345678-abcd-1234-efgh-123456789012)

name: execute_range_query

description: Get a list of all metric names available in the Prometheus server

workspace_id.description: The Prometheus workspace ID to use (e.g., ws-12345678-abcd-1234-efgh-123456789012)

name: list_metrics

description: Get information about the Prometheus server configuration

workspace_id.description: The Prometheus workspace ID to use (e.g., ws-12345678-abcd-1234-efgh-123456789012)

name: get_server_info

description: List all available Prometheus workspaces in the specified region

profile.description: AWS profile to use (defaults to None)

name: get_available_workspaces
